newsitem.title: USA: Titan Resources acquires oil/gas co.
newsitem.headline: Titan Resources acquires oil/gas co.

text.p: Titan Resources Inc said it has signed an agreement with the Gary Lewis Family Trust to acquire GEL Exploration Ltd, a privately held oil and gas exploration company, for shares in Titan.
Gary Lewis, the president and chief executive of GEL, is to become president of Titan Resources and will assume the responsibility of operating the company on a day to day basis, the company said.

In April, as the company announced that it planned an acquisition that would mark its re-entry into the oil and natural gas exploration and development business, Titan President Brent Nelson said he would step down
A dollar value for the deal was not immediately available.
